typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		Campaign_Name as string,
		Revenue as string,
		Revenue_Target as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		RoleID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DatafromTeraData
DatafromTeraData derive(Revenue_Target = round(toInteger(Revenue_Target),4),
		Revenue = round(toInteger(Revenue),4)) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		Region,
		Country,
		Campaign_Name,
		Revenue,
		Revenue_Target
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumn
DerivedColumn select(mapColumn(
		Region,
		Country,
		Campaign_Name,
		Revenue,
		Revenue_Target,
		City,
		State,
		RoleID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectRequiredColumns aggregate(groupBy(Campaign_Name,
		Region,
		Country),
	Revenue_Target = sum(Revenue_Target)) ~> TotalRevenueByCampaign
SelectColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LoadtoAzureSynapse
TotalRevenueByCampaign sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AggregatedMarketingData
